paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: Age range: 59.33±5.5 years (eplontersen group), 62.43±6.2 years (control group); 83% male in eplontersen group, 71% male in control group.

functional_data.summary: Eplontersen treatment may be effective in patients with hereditary transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy.

variants.segregation_data: The A97S mutation is associated with hATTR‐CM.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the potential efficacy of eplontersen in treating hATTR‐CM.
